name: DTU CORP
overview:
DTU Corporation has been established with the motto “for the youth’s future”

It has been accelerating fast in size, business scopes and achievement. You can view this link to know more about our corporation: http://www.dtu.com.vn/partners/DTU.pdf

>>> Its members of Board of Directors are successful businessmen who have accumulated many years of professional experiences both at overseas and in Vietnam. Duc Tu Corporation is operating mainly in Education. Duc Tu Corp. is the owner of the 2 brand names DTU and I AM UNIQUE.

>>> I AM UNIQUE life skill course was built up by 3 members of Board of Directors. Our objective is to enhance the life quality of Vietnamese youths. And from there, we will create a useful play-ground for the youths to entertain as well as study at the same time.

>>> DTU has the objective of Bridging Globally in Education and Medical Tourism. For Education, we have a very large connection with schools all over the world. And for Medical Tourism, we work very closely with hospitals in Singapore.

>>> DTU’s strategies:

  • Becoming a bridge between Vietnam and other developed countries such as Singapore, UK, Australia, US,.. in economy, education and healthcare.

  • Creating business and investment opportunities between Vietnam and Singapore

>>> DTU’s business scopes:

  • Overseas Education Consultation: free consulting and providing full-package service on education in developed countries such as: Singapore, UK, US, Australia, Canada, Switzerland…

  • Medical Tourism: supporting Vietnamese patients during medical treatment in Singapore hospitals, arranging for accomodation, translator and tour guide; the medical treatment ranging from severe disease, cosmetic surgery, to dental care…

  • Overseas Job Referring: referring internship, jobs in Singapore, US and other countries for Vietnamese manpower.

offices.address1: 158 Ho Ba Kien street, ward 15, district 10
